title: Configure build and deploy preview
body:
Set up CI/CD preview deployments using Netlify or Vercel.
Steps:
- Connect GitHub repo
- Configure build command and output directory
- Test PR-based previews

title: Add loading spinner or skeleton UI
body:
Improve UX by showing a loading indicator for route changes or slow loads.
Use `react-loading` or custom skeletons.

title: Animate route transitions
body:
Integrate `framer-motion` to add transitions between pages.
Use `AnimatePresence` and `motion.div` in layout wrapper.

title: Create contact form
body:
Add a form on `/contact` page to capture messages.
Options:
- Netlify Forms
- EmailJS
- Custom backend (if needed)

title: Scaffold placeholder `/store` page
body:
Design a basic layout for future tool sales.
Show 2–3 placeholder product cards with 'Coming Soon' banners.

title: Add dark mode toggle
body:
Use CSS variables or Tailwind-style toggle to support light/dark themes.
Persist preference using localStorage.

title: Generate sitemap and robots.txt
body:
Improve SEO by creating a basic `sitemap.xml` and `robots.txt` file.
Use `vite-plugin-sitemap` or manual config.

title: Add analytics tracking
body:
Integrate privacy-friendly analytics.
Options: Google Analytics, Plausible, or Umami.

title: Scaffold blog module
body:
Prepare for future blogging section.
Create `/blog` route, dummy post layout, and placeholder Markdown content.

title: Run final MVP checklist
body:
Verify core functionality:
- Responsive layout
- Routing
- Image and font loading
- Issue list and project card rendering
- Build works locally
